product_name: Fischer Desire My Style Cross-Country Skis with Bindings - Women's
long_description: The women's Fischer Desire My Style Cross-Country Skis are mid-length recreational skis that can be used in or out of track and come pre-mounted with NNN bindings to get you out on the snow.
short_description: The women's Fischer Desire My Style Cross-Country Skis are mid-length recreational skis that can be used in or out of track and come pre-mounted with NNN bindings to get you out on the snow.
